meanings.definition: Duffs (noun): a slang term for buttocks or backside
meanings.sent1: She fell down and landed right on her duffs.
meanings.sent2: The baby sat on his duffs and giggled happily.
meanings.sent3: After sitting for too long, her duffs felt numb.
meanings.sent4: The cat's fluffy tail resembled a bushy duffs.
meanings.sent5: The cold bench made her duffs shiver.

meanings.definition: Duffs (verb): to fail or make a mistake
meanings.sent1: He duffs his lines during the school play.
meanings.sent2: I hope I don't duffs this important test.
meanings.sent3: She duffs up the recipe by adding salt instead of sugar.
meanings.sent4: The quarterback duffs the pass, causing a turnover.
meanings.sent5: Don't duffs up the presentation by forgetting your notes.
